circumstances: The pilot, sole on board, was performing a local test flight at Mena Airport. During initial climb, one of the engine failed. He elected to return but misjudged his altitude and clearance when the airplane struck trees and crashed near the airport. The aircraft was destroyed and the pilot was injured.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure for undetermined reasons. The following findings were reported:
- Misjudged altitude and clearance, 
- High obstructions, 
- Complete engine failure, 
- Forced landing of airport on land.
